verses.name: Ezekiel 8:13
verses.text: He said also unto me, Turn thee yet again, and thou shalt see greater abominations that they do.

verses.name: Ezekiel 8:14
verses.text: Then he brought me to the door of the gate of the Lord’s house which was toward the north; and, behold, there sat women weeping for Tammuz.

verses.name: Ezekiel 8:15
verses.text: Then said he unto me, Hast thou seen this, O son of man? turn thee yet again, and thou shalt see greater abominations than these.
